org.youscope.addon.component

Class GenericComponentMetadata<C extends Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.addon.component.GenericComponentMetadata<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Specific subclass of configuration for which an UI should be created.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddonMetadata, ComponentMetadata<C>

    public class GenericComponentMetadata<C extends Configuration>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentMetadata<C>
    Helper class to construct configuration metadata. Most of the metadata is directly extracted from the configuration class using java reflection. During this extraction, the annotations defined in org.youscope.common.configuration.annotations are used, if given, or generic names for the respective properties is extracted given e.g. the name of the class.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

      • getConfigurationClass

        public java.lang.Class<C> getConfigurationClass()
        Description copied from interface: ComponentMetadata
        Returns the class of the configuration of the measurement component. The class should have a public no-argument constructor, such that newInstance() can be called.
        Specified by:

      • getClassification

        public java.lang.String[] getClassification()
        Description copied from interface: AddonMetadata
        Returns an array of strings (possibly of length 0) specifying the classification of the addon. This classification can e.g. be used to order addons into a certain folder structure.
        Specified by:
        getClassification in interface AddonMetadata
        Returns:
        classification of addon.

      • getComponentInterface

        public java.lang.Class<? extends Component> getComponentInterface()
        Description copied from interface: ComponentMetadata
        Returns the interface of the measurement component created when the configuration is parsed. This should not be the implementation of the component, but rather a public interface implementing Remote.
        Specified by:
        getComponentInterface in interface ComponentMetadata<C extends Configuration>
        Returns:
        Component interface.
